title: Quick Gumbo in Pastry Shells
description: Golden puff pastry shells are filled with a Louisiana-style gumbo made with chicken, shrimp, kielbasa, green and red peppers and cream of celery soup. This recipe has great taste and comfort written all over it!

title: Bacon and Clam White Pizza
description: This out-of-the-ordinary pizza combines bacon and clams to create a flavorful, herb-scented pizza in no time. But what makes it really good is the puff pastry crust. Yum!

title: Chorizo and Shrimp en Cro_te
description: How about a little Gulf Coast flavor in a puff pastry shell? These shells, filled with a spicy sausage and shrimp mix, are special enough for company, but easy enough for everyday.

title: Roasted Corn, Tomato, Black Bean and Avocado Tarts
description: Refreshing and easy to make, this tasty recipe has it all. Individual puff pastry shells are filled with marinated shrimp and a kicked-up corn and bean salad.  It's a terrific summertime dish, that's delicious year-round.

title: Creamy Shrimp & Corn Stew in Shells
description: This dish is ready in under an hour, but it looks and tastes like it took much longer.  It features puff pastry shells filled with shrimp, shallots and corn in a kicked-up lemon cream sauce.

title: Gumbo Casserole
description: Two comfort foods, gumbo and casserole, come together to make a tasty family favorite. Plus, it takes just 15 minutes to put together before you pop it in the oven. You don't even have to cook the rice beforehand.

title: Pesto Crab Cakes
description: Cream of celery soup and prepared pesto strike just the right balance with lump crabmeat in these absolutely scrumptious crab cakes.

title: Halibut with Beans and Spinach
description: Tender halibut fillets are served on a delicious bed of seasoned spinach and great Northern beans to make a quick-cooking, restaurant-style dish.

title: Crab and Corn Chowder
description: Just as good as the satisfying chowders you find in restaurants along the New England coast, this creamy chowder can easily be made at home in less than an hour. Why not whip some up right now?

title: Easy One-Pot Spaghetti & Clams
description: One pot and 30 minutes is all it takes to serve a delicious meal featuring spaghetti and clams in a spicy garlic sauce. When you've got a hungry crowd to feed, this is the dish for you!

title: Mediterranean Fish Soup
description: Mussels, halibut and shrimp flavored with chicken broth and white wine makes an outstanding fish soup that's ready from the start in 30 minutes.

title: Roasted Asparagus & Shrimp Soup with Parmesan Cheese Croutons
description: Roasting asparagus, tomatoes, onion and garlic in oil intensifies the flavors. Add the roasted vegetables to chicken broth with shrimp and top with Parmesan croutons to make a scrumptious soup.

title: Chilled Shrimp Gazpacho
description: Shrimp, cantaloupe and balsamic vinegar make this gazpacho deliciously different. And it only takes 15 minutes to make! It's so refreshing, especially on a hot summer's day.

title: Spinach Artichoke Crab Dip
description: When you really want an appetizer that will impress your guests, this is the one to make. It combines spinach-artichoke spreadable cheese and lump crabmeat, that's baked until hot and golden. it's so good!

title: Herbed Tuna Dip
description: Unexpected guests are no problem, because this tasty dip uses on-hand ingredients to make a delicious dip, perfect with crackers or assorted dippers.

title: Picante Shrimp & Pepper Pasta
description: Yes, you can get this vibrant, Creole-flavored dish on the table in less than a half-hour. This dish will save you on busy weeknights, but it's good enough for relaxed weekend dinners too!

title: Shrimp Stuffed Shells
description: Feta and Parmesan cheeses combine with the fresh flavor of shrimp star in this kicked-up, crowd-pleasing casserole.

title: Papaya Shrimp Salad
description: Are you in the mood for a salad, but looking for something different? Try this fresh and flavor-packed version, with tropical ingredients highlighted by a lemon-picante dressing.

title: Pan-Seared Salmon in Peach Mango Sauce
description: Each serving of this tender pan-seared salmon provides a full serving of vegetables and is served on a bed of brown rice, topped with a fantastic sauce made with V8 V-Fusion Peach Mango, fresh mango, red pepper, garlic, spinach, honey, lime juice and cilantro.

title: Grilled Tomatillo Tuna Steaks
description: Here's an easy way to add a burst of fresh flavor to grilled tuna steaks.  Prepared tomatillo salsa is the secret ingredient adds lots of flavor without a lot of work. Fire up the grill and give this delicious dish a try.

title: Cod Veracruz
description: The fresh flavors of the Mexican seacoast are featured in this simple baked dish flavored with a zesty sauce.

title: Glazed Salmon Puffs with Citrus Salsa
description: This vibrant and distinctive main dish features a bed of crisp salad greens topped with a puff pastry shell, brimming with tender glazed salmon and a refreshing citrus salsa. Elegant, yet surprisingly easy, it's ready in just 45 minutes.

title: Fish with Peach Mango Salsa & Rice
description: In just 15 minutes you can add a little island flair to sawtayed fish that's finished in a fresh and kicky peach mango salsa.

title: Roasted Garlic & Herb Shrimp with Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti and shrimp are tossed with a spicy red sauce to make a quick-cooking dinner that fits right into your busy day.

title: Picante Grilled Fish
description: All you need is fifteen minutes and a jar of picante sauce to add a punch of bold flavor to grilled salmon steaks.

title: Seafood Tomato Alfredo
description: Hot linguine is topped with a creamy tomato and mushroom sauce that is studded with chunks of tender white fish to make this luscious and satisfying fish dish.

title: Carole's Crab Rangoon Shells
description: Looking for something different to serve as an appetizer? Try these scrumptious crab filled puff pastry shells topped with a cherry-vinegar sauce. Yes, they're different, and really delicious!

title: Crusted Tilapia Florentine
description: This restaurant-style dish is on the table in just over 35 minutes. prepared Italian sauce and frozen spinach makes it easy and delicious!

title: Crabmeat Strudel
description: Wow your guests with this delectable appetizer featuring a flavorful crabmeat filling surrounded by layers of flaky puff pastry. It looks impressive, but it's easy to make!

title: Seafood Pot Pie
description: Break into the flaky puff pastry crust and you'll find a delectable pot pie filling packed with shrimp, imitation crabmeat and lots of vegetables. It's an impressive dish. And only you'll know how easy it is to make!

title: Crazy Clams
description: What makes these clams crazy?  They're served in a tasty Italian sauce that's kicked up with garlic and crushed red pepper, and served with garlic toast to sop up the extra sauce. They're crazy good.

title: Grilled Fish Steaks with Chunky Tomato Sauce
description: Fire up the grill to make these simple and delicious fish steaks accented with a slightly spicy tomato sauce.  They're ready in just 35 minutes!

title: Chicken & Shrimp Jambalaya
description: You won't believe how easy it is to make this Cajun-style favorite!  So get out your skillet and get ready for a boldly flavored dish that's sure to please the whole family.

title: Seafood Chowder
description: You don't have to live in New England to enjoy a delicious chowder. This version's loaded with seafood, easy-to-make, and ready in less than 45 minutes!

title: Herbed Crab Cakes
description: Set aside the bread crumbs. Herb-seasoned stuffing is the secret to moist and flavorful crab cakes.

title: Fabulous Fast Shrimp
description: Yes, you can make a restaurant-style dinner really fast. In this dish, shrimp sawtays quickly with trinity. Creole for green pepper, onion and celery. And is stirred into a creamy sauce to top hot rice.

title: Mini Crab Cakes with Creamy Picante Sauce
description: Restaurant crab cakes can't compete with this simply delicious recipe. Our crab cakes have just enough breadcrumbs to hold them together. And the 2-ingredient dipping sauce is divine!
